overview: Renowned multi-instrumentalist, singer, songwriter, producer and now ringleader Devin Townsend played a special concert October 27, 2012 at the Roundhouse venue in London, England as part of a one-night-only event, dubbed "The Retinal Circus".
tagline: The Bizarre World of Devin Townsend
title: Devin Townsend - The Retinal Circus
